pr_title: DHFPROD-6109: Spark connector can now run on Java 8

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-6109: Spark connector can now run on Java 8

Had to do some refactoring of HubClient/HubConfig to accomplish this:

1. HubClient is now in a new api subproject that can run on Java 8
1. All of HubConfigImpl needed to construct HubClient is now in HubClientConfig in the api project
1. Bumped all of DHF to Java Client 5.3
1. Bumped up Gradle to 6.4 so its version of kotlin matches that of Java Client 5.3
